title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Shelby Township, Michigan
content:
Photo submitted by Lora Loche, “Unseasonably warm and sunny December afternoon in Shelby Township, MI.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Shelby Township, Michigan appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
